Medical Practitioners can get hassel free loan from Purvanchal bank
\nobjective:
\n-> to provide financial assitance to well qualified medical practitioners of any discipline for Setting up clinic, expansion / renovation / modernisation of existing clinic, X-Ray lab, pathological lab, etc
\n-> to buying medical equipments
\n-> to purchase of computers and other essential equipments for clinic, etc
\nEligibility:
\n-> Individuals/ partnership firms.
\n-> Promoters should be registered practitioners and possessing minimum qualification MBBS and BDS.
\n-> Borrower should be registered with respective Council.
